abstract: Pixel data formats for image input, output, and processing.

# CIFormat

**Structure**

Pixel data formats for image input, output, and processing.

## Declaration

```swift
struct CIFormat
```

## Image Formats

- **A16**: A 16-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the sole component is alpha.
- **A8**: An 8-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the sole component is alpha.
- **ABGR8**: A 32-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the alpha value precedes the blue, green, and red color components.
- **ARGB8**: A 32-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the alpha value precedes the red, green, and blue color components.
- **Af**: A 32-bit-per-pixel, full-width floating-point pixel format in which the sole component is alpha.
- **Ah**: A 16-bit-per-pixel, half-width floating-point pixel format in which the sole component is alpha.
- **BGRA8**: A 32-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the blue, green, and red color components precede the alpha value.
- **R16**: A 16-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the sole component is a red color value.
- **R8**: An 8-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the sole component is a red color value.
- **RG16**: A 32-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format with only red and green color components.
- **RG8**: A 16-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format with only red and green color components.
- **RGB10**
- **RGBA16**: A 64-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format.
- **RGBX16**
- **RGBA8**: A 32-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the red, green, and blue color components precede the alpha value.
- **RGBAf**: A 128-bit-per-pixel, floating-point pixel format.
- **rgbXf**
- **RGBAh**: A 64-bit-per-pixel, floating-point pixel format.
- **rgbXh**
- **RGf**: A 64-bit-per-pixel, floating-point pixel format with only red and green color components.
- **RGh**: A 32-bit-per-pixel, floating-point pixel format with only red and green color components.
- **Rf**: A 32-bit-per-pixel, floating-point pixel format in which the sole component is a red color value.
- **Rh**: A 16-bit-per-pixel, floating-point pixel format in which the sole component is a red color value.
- **L16**: A 16-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the sole component is luminance.
- **L8**: An 8-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the sole component is luminance.
- **LA16**: A 32-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format with only 16-bit luminance and alpha components.
- **LA8**: A 16-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format with only 8-bit luminance and alpha components.
- **LAf**: A 64-bit-per-pixel, full-width floating-point pixel format with 32-bit luminance and alpha components.
- **LAh**: A 32-bit-per-pixel, half-width floating-point pixel format with 16-bit luminance and alpha components.
- **Lf**: A 32-bit-per-pixel, full-width floating-point pixel format in which the sole component is luminance.
- **Lh**: A 16-bit-per-pixel, half-width floating-point pixel format in which the sole component is luminance.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Type Properties

- **RGBX8**

## Custom Filters

- **Writing Custom Kernels**: Write your own custom kernels in either the Core Image Kernel Language or the Metal Shading Language.
- **CIKernel**: A GPU-based image-processing routine used to create custom Core Image filters.
- **CIColorKernel**: A GPU-based image-processing routine that processes only the color information in images, used to create custom Core Image filters.
- **CIWarpKernel**: A GPU-based image-processing routine that processes only the geometry information in an image, used to create custom Core Image filters.
- **CIBlendKernel**: A GPU-based image-processing routine that is optimized for blending two images.
- **CISampler**: An object that retrieves pixel samples for processing by a filter kernel.
- **CIFilterShape**: A description of the bounding shape of a filter and the domain of definition for a filter operation.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
